Directions: In a bowl, dissolve gelatin in boiling water. In a blender or food processor, process the cottage cheese until smooth. Stir into gelatin. Refrigerate until partially set. Fold in whipped topping. Pour into a 3-cup mold coated with nonstick cooking spray. Refrigerate until set.
Ingredients: 1 (0.3 ounce) package sugar-free Jell-O® flavor of your choice
